p:
The prevalence of virus B/Phuket/3073/2013 – Yamagata lineage not included in the trivalent vaccine of the 2017–2018 season and the contribution of virus circulation A/Singapore/16-0019/2016 (H3N2), also not included in the vaccine as well as the high proportion of elderly cases (65% >64 years old) may have been the cause of the great number of SHLCI cases. This fact has also been reported in the Spanish influenza surveillance network 2017–2018 report.
11
